articles.title: References
articles.description: Information useful for building and maintaining this blog.
articles.contents:
For reminders on how to:
comprehend the build workflow
create a post
distill::create_post() - see help for details
importantly, drafts are marked in YAML with draft: true

Miscellaneous
if a link doesn’t begin with “http” or “https”, it will be interpreted as a relative path…you’ve been warned!!!
